<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TAXES
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/09/new-york-raises-income-taxes-super-wealthy-raising-concerns-among-corporations?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Rich People in New York This Weekend
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Succession GIF" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=377 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/8hYypG9y61uLFBElHR/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Succession GIF" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/8hYypG9y61uLFBElHR/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Succession</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">New York is seeing how much dough it can squeeze out of millionaires’ paychecks without pushing them to Fisher Island.  </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This week, state lawmakers <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/04/08/new-yorks-wealthiest-look-for-exits-as-state-readies-hefty-tax-increase-.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">passed a budget</a> that raises the personal income tax on individuals making over $1 million and introduces two new brackets for those making more than $5 million and $25 million.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The changes mean that the wealthiest New York City residents will face the highest combined local and state personal income rate in the country, surpassing California.</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">That’s not a record some New Yorkers want to break</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">250 business executives have <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/new-york-business-leaders-urge-state-lawmakers-to-not-raise-taxes-11616493600?mod=article_inline&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">sent a letter</a> to state lawmakers arguing that higher taxes would “jeopardize New York’s recovery from the economic crisis inflicted by Covid-19” by sending high-net-worth people fleeing. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>The top 1% of New Yorkers </span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-04-07/richest-new-york-residents-face-top-tax-rate-of-over-50-in-cuomo-s-budget-plan?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">paid $4.9 billion</a></span><span> in local income taxes in 2018, accounting for 42.5% of the income tax collected by the city.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Meanwhile, just three hours south on a JetBlue flight, Miami’s Tweeter-in-Chief Mayor Francis Suarez is welcoming New York’s wealthy with the promise of zero state income taxes and a Carbone reservation. Firms such as Silver Lake and Blackstone have already started beefing up their presence in FL.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Which makes many NYC leaders, including mayoral candidates Andrew Yang and Ray McGuire, anxious that the tax hike could lead to a <a href="https://www.ft.com/content/22c9b76b-ea36-4c8c-8cae-1bbb104098d2?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">1970s-esque corporate exodus</a>, when the city lost half its Fortune 500 companies. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Proponents say it’s now or never </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Armed with census data showing that NY has the <a href="https://www.cbsnews.com/news/new-york-city-rich-face-52-percent-combined-top-income-tax-rate-highest-in-u-s/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">greatest economic inequality</a> of any state, advocates of the tax hike argue the rich should pay more to fund basic public services that can help turn the state’s pandemic-stricken economy around. New York’s recovery is lagging behind the rest of the country, posting the <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/new-york-citys-wealthy-will-pay-nations-highest-tax-rates-how-will-that-affect-a-rebound-11617909519?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">second-highest unemployment rate</a> of any state in February. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>the tax fight serves as the backdrop for what the FT calls “one of the most consequential” mayoral races in the city’s history. The Democratic primary, which in this liberal stronghold will likely determine the race, is in June. </p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
COVID
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/09/vaccine-tracker-april-10?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Vaccine Tracker
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Vaccine tracker" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80MjA0L3ZhY2NpbmVfdHJhY2tlci5KUEciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">In the US…</strong>20% of Americans are <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/04/09/covid-19-cases-deaths-vaccinations-daily-update.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">fully vaccinated</a> against Covid-19, and a third of the population has received at least one dose, per the CDC. The US is averaging about 3 million shots per day.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Around the world…</strong>40% of total Covid-19 vaccines have gone to 27 <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-04-09/when-will-world-be-fully-vaccinated-pace-is-2-400-faster-in-wealthy-countries?srnd=premium&sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">wealthy countries</a> that make up 11% of the world population. Only 1.6% have gone to the least-wealthy 11% of countries, according to Bloomberg. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>One place that’s </span><span><a href="https://www.bangkokpost.com/world/2097603/gibraltar-unlocks-after-mass-vaccinations?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">fully reopened</a></span><span> after most of its population got vaccinated? The tiny British territory of Gibraltar.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">More headlines</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Supply chained: </strong>Johnson & Johnson vaccine deliveries are expected to drop more than 80% next week as the company copes with <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/j-j-covid-19-vaccine-deliveries-to-drop-significantly-next-week-11617970201?mod=hp_lead_pos2&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">manufacturing hiccups</a>.  </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Once vaccinated, twice shy: </strong>Some US health experts are arguing second doses <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/04/09/health/covid-vaccine-second-dose-delay.html?action=click&module=Top%20Stories&pgtype=Homepage&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">should be delayed</a> for the already-jabbed and instead redirected to people who have yet to receive their first. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Would be lit: </strong>Pfizer-BioNTech became the first vaccine makers to <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/04/09/pfizer-biontech-request-expanded-emergency-use-of-covid-19-vaccine-for-ages-12-15.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">ask the FDA</a> to expand emergency use authorization to adolescents aged 12–15. </p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
OBITUARY
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/09/death-two-notable-public-figures-friday-sparks-messages-remembrance?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Legendary Rapper DMX and Prince Philip Died Yesterday
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/09/death-two-notable-public-figures-friday-sparks-messages-remembrance" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Rapper DMX and Prince Philip" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80NjkxL29iaXR1YXJ5LnBuZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Jerod Harris/Getty, Karwai Tang/Getty</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">We lost two public figures yesterday: DMX and Prince Philip. While their work and platforms couldn’t have been more different, both made contributions that spurred emotional messages of remembrance on social media.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">DMX. </strong>Earl Simmons’s family <a href="https://www.vanityfair.com/style/2021/04/dmx-obituary?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">announced</a> yesterday that he had died at age 50 after a serious heart attack following a reported drug overdose. Fans gravitated toward his intense lyrics, where he opened up about his struggles with addiction and his difficult childhood. Simmons released his first two albums in 1998, both hitting No. 1 and going multi-platinum. He was <a href="https://www.bet.com/music/2021/04/04/dmx-top-songs-most-popular-best-list.html?cid=BET__TW+___4716074515&linkId=115784806&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">regarded</a> as one of the biggest hip hop stars in the late 1990s and early 2000s.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The Duke of Edinburgh.</strong> Prince Philip, husband of Queen Elizabeth II, was the longest-serving royal spouse in British history. He was 99 when he <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/04/09/obituaries/prince-philip-dead.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">died</a> yesterday at Windsor Castle. Philip took his role seriously and tried to modernize the royal family, but often made headlines for controversial, racist comments.</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SPONSORED BY BOMBAY
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="#" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
It’s Not Just Gin
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://attach.mikmak.tv/3008ce06/6bc30367-487f-a42f-831c-bcf4715b2c6c?channelType=email&trafficType=paid&attachCampaignName=q4-morning-brew-stir-creativity&handle=bombay-sapphire&platformType=email&adPlacementType=na&adUnitType=static-ad&paidAudienceType=morning-brew-newsletter-subscribers&adUnitCreative=newsletter-daily-brew-primary-410&campaignObjectiveType=awareness" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Bombay" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL3BsYWNlbWVudC9pbWFnZXMvMjc4OC8xNjE2NjExOTAwLTE1MDB4ODAwXy1fQk9UQU5JQ0FMX18xXy5wbmciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJjb21ldC1tb3JuaW5nYnJldyIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">You wouldn’t say Moroccan cubeb berries are <em>just </em>berries, or that West African Grains of Paradise are <em>just</em> plain old grains.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">So you simply would not say <a href="https://attach.mikmak.tv/3008ce06/6bc30367-487f-a42f-831c-bcf4715b2c6c?channelType=email&trafficType=paid&attachCampaignName=q4-morning-brew-stir-creativity&handle=bombay-sapphire&platformType=email&adPlacementType=na&adUnitType=static-ad&paidAudienceType=morning-brew-newsletter-subscribers&adUnitCreative=newsletter-daily-brew-primary-410&campaignObjectiveType=awareness" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Bombay Sapphire</a> is <em>just</em> gin. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">When it comes to botanicals, Bombay means business. Need proof? They have someone who literally bears the title, <em>Master of Botanicals</em>. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Not only is that the greatest resume mic drop you’ve ever heard, but this person gets to travel around the world to find the <strong style="color:#000">brightest and most vibrant botanicals from growers themselves</strong>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">All 10 of Bombay’s botanical ingredients are on track to be certified sustainable in 2021. That’s a win for farmers—and a big win for <a href="https://attach.mikmak.tv/3008ce06/6bc30367-487f-a42f-831c-bcf4715b2c6c?channelType=email&trafficType=paid&attachCampaignName=q4-morning-brew-stir-creativity&handle=bombay-sapphire&platformType=email&adPlacementType=na&adUnitType=static-ad&paidAudienceType=morning-brew-newsletter-subscribers&adUnitCreative=newsletter-daily-brew-primary-410&campaignObjectiveType=awareness" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">what’s in your glass</a>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In fact, Bombay considers these botanicals so precious, they utilize a vapor infusion process to delicately extract the flavors and aromas.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">At the end of the day, it’s not <em>just </em>ingredients, it’s not <em>just</em> a G&T, and it’s not <em>just </em>gin.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://attach.mikmak.tv/3008ce06/6bc30367-487f-a42f-831c-bcf4715b2c6c?channelType=email&trafficType=paid&attachCampaignName=q4-morning-brew-stir-creativity&handle=bombay-sapphire&platformType=email&adPlacementType=na&adUnitType=static-ad&paidAudienceType=morning-brew-newsletter-subscribers&adUnitCreative=newsletter-daily-brew-primary-410&campaignObjectiveType=awareness" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">It’s Bombay</a>.</p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</th>
</tr>
</table>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
BUDGET
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/09/biden-administration-releases-152-trillion-budget-proposal?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Biden Wants a Blank Check for Next Year’s Budget
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/09/biden-administration-releases-152-trillion-budget-proposal" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="A scale with a bag of money on one side and a globe on the other." style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80NjkyL2J1ZGdldF9zY2FsZS5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">President Biden <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-04-09/more-for-climate-aid-amtrak-irs-audits-key-budget-takeaways?srnd=premium&sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">released</a> a $1.52 trillion fiscal 2022 budget request to Congress yesterday, and he’s asking for an 8% increase to fund the climate fight, the IRS, and other social programs.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The earth is getting a makeover.</strong> The plan calls for $14 billion for domestic climate programs and investments in clean energy, such as buying electric vehicles for the USPS. It wouldn’t hurt to throw in a couple extra mil for <a href="https://www.theverge.com/2021/2/23/22297823/usps-postal-service-mail-truck-electric-oshkosh-workhorse?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">some design help</a>...</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">You gotta spend money to make money.</strong> Biden wants to give the IRS $900 million to ramp up audits and recoup an extra $175 billion of lost taxes from the estimated 21% of income some of the wealthiest households <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/03/22/irs-researchers-wealthiest-1-didnt-disclose-21-income-irs?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">don’t report</a>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Other highlights:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>$3 billion for immigration—an issue Biden recently was criticized for and </span><span><a href="https://www.businessinsider.com/biden-kamala-harris-immigration-southern-border-negotiations-honduras-guatemala-2021-3?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">handed over</a></span><span> to VP Kamala Harris</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>$2.7 billion for Amtrak, with most of that going to pay for better delay excuses</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>23% increase in health spending and a record 40% increase for education</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>Biden will have trouble passing this proposed budget because of a 1.7% increase to defense spending that already has GOP lawmakers <a href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/andrewsolender/2021/04/09/bidens-defense-budget-request-panned-by-gop-progressive-democrats-in-congress/?sh=7cb7fd4c5257&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">grumbling</a>.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TECH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/09/video-shows-elon-musks-neuralinkchipped-monkey-play-pong-mind?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Elon Musk’s Zootopian Technology
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="monkey playing Pong" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=377 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/hzfkg5FowsBvA4iplA/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="monkey playing Pong" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/hzfkg5FowsBvA4iplA/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Neuralink</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Elon Musk’s Neuralink is taking “monkey see, monkey do” to another level. Yesterday, the neurotech company <a href="https://techcrunch.com/2021/04/08/watch-a-monkey-equipped-with-elon-musks-neuralink-device-play-pong-with-its-brain/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">released a video</a> that claims to show a monkey controlling a game via chips implanted in his brain. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Here’s the play-by-play:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>The monkey (ironically named Pager) moves his joystick to play the </span><span><em>Pong</em></span><span> game displayed on the screen.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The Neuralink device analyzes Pager’s movements and begins to predict them.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The joystick is disconnected, but Neuralink continues to accurately predict Pager’s movements. </span></li>
</ol>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">For Pager, the feat meant a well-deserved banana. For humanity, Elon Musk <a href="https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1380315654524301315?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">explained</a> on Twitter the technology could “enable someone with paralysis to use a smartphone with their mind faster than someone using thumbs.” </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Stay skeptical, San Diego</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Musk later tweeted, “Soon our monkey will be on twitch & discord haha,” and the video <a href="https://www.theverge.com/2021/4/8/22374749/elon-musk-neuralink-monkey-pong-brain-interface?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">lacks any peer reviews</a> from the scientific community. But this kind of neural mind control <em>does</em> have precedent: A paralyzed man once controlled a robot arm in order to <a href="https://www.theverge.com/2015/5/21/8639905/brain-control-robot-arm-paralyzed-quadriplegic?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">drink beer</a>. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>Neuralink has grand ambitions that go beyond enabling people to play <em>Pong</em> while wrist-deep in two bags of Cheetos. Musk tweeted that later versions of this device could enable paraplegics <a href="https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1380315654524301315?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1380315654524301315%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.theverge.com%2F2021%2F4%2F8%2F22374749%2Felon-musk-neuralink-monkey-pong-brain-interface&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">to walk again</a>.</p>

style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eSuccession\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eNew York is seeing how much dough it can squeeze out of millionaires’ paychecks without pushing them to Fisher Island.  \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThis week, state lawmakers \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/04/08/new-yorks-wealthiest-look-for-exits-as-state-readies-hefty-tax-increase-.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epassed a budget\u003c/a\u003e that raises the personal income tax on individuals making over $1 million and introduces two new brackets for those making more than $5 million and $25 million.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe changes mean that the wealthiest New York City residents will face the highest combined local and state personal income rate in the country, surpassing California.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThat’s not a record some New Yorkers want to break\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e250 business executives have \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/new-york-business-leaders-urge-state-lawmakers-to-not-raise-taxes-11616493600?mod=article_inline\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esent a letter\u003c/a\u003e to state lawmakers arguing that higher taxes would “jeopardize New York’s recovery from the economic crisis inflicted by Covid-19” by sending high-net-worth people fleeing. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eThe top 1% of New Yorkers \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-04-07/richest-new-york-residents-face-top-tax-rate-of-over-50-in-cuomo-s-budget-plan?sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epaid $4.9 billion\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e in local income taxes in 2018, accounting for 42.5% of the income tax collected by the city.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eMeanwhile, just three hours south on a JetBlue flight, Miami’s Tweeter-in-Chief Mayor Francis Suarez is welcoming New York’s wealthy with the promise of zero state income taxes and a Carbone reservation. Firms such as Silver Lake and Blackstone have already started beefing up their presence in FL.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWhich makes many NYC leaders, including mayoral candidates Andrew Yang and Ray McGuire, anxious that the tax hike could lead to a \u003ca href=\"https://www.ft.com/content/22c9b76b-ea36-4c8c-8cae-1bbb104098d2?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e1970s-esque corporate exodus\u003c/a\u003e, when the city lost half its Fortune 500 companies. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eProponents say it’s now or never \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eArmed with census data showing that NY has the \u003ca href=\"https://www.cbsnews.com/news/new-york-city-rich-face-52-percent-combined-top-income-tax-rate-highest-in-u-s/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003egreatest economic inequality\u003c/a\u003e of any state, advocates of the tax hike argue the rich should pay more to fund basic public services that can help turn the state’s pandemic-stricken economy around. New York’s recovery is lagging behind the rest of the country, posting the \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/new-york-citys-wealthy-will-pay-nations-highest-tax-rates-how-will-that-affect-a-rebound-11617909519?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esecond-highest unemployment rate\u003c/a\u003e of any state in February. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003ethe tax fight serves as the backdrop for what the FT calls “one of the most consequential” mayoral races in the city’s history. The Democratic primary, which in this liberal stronghold will likely determine the race, is in June. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding-top: 12px;\"\u003e\n\u003ca href=\"https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2021%2F04%2F09%2Fnew-york-raises-income-taxes-super-wealthy-raising-concerns-among-corporations\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"text-decoration: none;\" class=\"\"\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"\" style=\"display: inline-block; collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWe lost two public figures yesterday: DMX and Prince Philip. While their work and platforms couldn’t have been more different, both made contributions that spurred emotional messages of remembrance on social media.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eDMX. \u003c/strong\u003eEarl Simmons’s family \u003ca href=\"https://www.vanityfair.com/style/2021/04/dmx-obituary?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eannounced\u003c/a\u003e yesterday that he had died at age 50 after a serious heart attack following a reported drug overdose. Fans gravitated toward his intense lyrics, where he opened up about his struggles with addiction and his difficult childhood. Simmons released his first two albums in 1998, both hitting No. 1 and going multi-platinum. He was \u003ca href=\"https://www.bet.com/music/2021/04/04/dmx-top-songs-most-popular-best-list.html?cid=BET__TW+___4716074515\u0026linkId=115784806\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eregarded\u003c/a\u003e as one of the biggest hip hop stars in the late 1990s and early 2000s.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe Duke of Edinburgh.\u003c/strong\u003e Prince Philip, husband of Queen Elizabeth II, was the longest-serving royal spouse in British history. href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/03/22/irs-researchers-wealthiest-1-didnt-disclose-21-income-irs?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/biden-kamala-harris-immigration-southern-border-negotiations-honduras-guatemala-2021-3?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" Harris\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003e$2.7 billion for Amtrak, with most of that going to pay for better delay excuses\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003e23% increase in health spending and a record 40% increase for education\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line: style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eNeuralink\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eElon Musk’s Neuralink is taking “monkey see, monkey do” to another level. Yesterday, the neurotech company \u003ca href=\"https://techcrunch.com/2021/04/08/watch-a-monkey-equipped-with-elon-musks-neuralink-device-play-pong-with-its-brain/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ereleased a video\u003c/a\u003e that claims to show a monkey controlling a game via chips implanted in his brain. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eHere’s the play-by-play:\u003c/strong\u003e \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003col\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eThe monkey (ironically named Pager) moves his joystick to play the \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cem\u003ePong\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e game displayed on the screen.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe Neuralink device analyzes Pager’s movements and begins to predict them.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe joystick is disconnected, but Neuralink continues to accurately predict Pager’s movements. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ol\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eFor Pager, the feat meant a well-deserved banana. For humanity, Elon Musk \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1380315654524301315?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eexplained\u003c/a\u003e on Twitter the technology could “enable someone with paralysis to use a smartphone with their mind faster than someone using thumbs.” \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eStay skeptical, San Diego\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eMusk later tweeted, “Soon our monkey will be on twitch \u0026 discord haha,” and the video \u003ca href=\"https://www.theverge.com/2021/4/8/22374749/elon-musk-neuralink-monkey-pong-brain-interface?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003elacks any peer reviews\u003c/a\u003e from the scientific community. But this kind of neural mind control \u003cem\u003edoes\u003c/em\u003e have precedent: A paralyzed man once controlled a robot arm in order to \u003ca href=\"https://www.theverge.com/2015/5/21/8639905/brain-control-robot-arm-paralyzed-quadriplegic?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edrink beer\u003c/a\u003e. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003eNeuralink has grand ambitions that go beyond enabling people to play \u003cem\u003ePong\u003c/em\u003e while wrist-deep in two bags of Cheetos. Musk tweeted that later versions of this device could enable paraplegics \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1380315654524301315?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1380315654524301315%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_\u0026ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.theverge.com%2F2021%2F4%2F8%2F22374749%2Felon-musk-neuralink-monkey-pong-brain-interface\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eto walk again\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS
